comments:
Create a SWT class extending Object, drop a Shell on the canvas, drop a button
onto the Shell, select the font property in the PS, open the property editor and
select one of the JFace fonts (e.g. JFace Banner) and select Okay to close the
property editor. An InstanciationException and a NullPointerException is thrown.
Also if you select the font editor again from the PS, it won't come up unless
you select another control and select this control again.

java.lang.InstantiationException: IWAV0125E
"org.eclipse.jface.resource.JFaceResources.getBannerFont()" is too complicated
to be evaluated

I don't think the JFace fonts should be allowed to be in the selection list...
not sure why they are there.
1.0M2 is out, so these are now closed in M2.
